name: Ship Defender (Multima, a. s.)
description:
We, a company Multima a. s., have decided to try something new.
Check out our first prototype made with Unity engine and let us know what you think about it.

The prototype is an endless ship shooter game. Your goal is to destroy as much enemies as possible, until they defeat you. Enemies will be spawn all over the map. How long will you survive?
